data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Muhammad-Rasul, Abdullah Halim, Ramli, Rosli, Low, Van Lun, Ahmad, Amirrudin, Grudpan, Chaiwut, Koolkalya, Sontaya, Khaironizam, Md. Zain (2018): Taxonomic revision of the genus Poropuntius (Teleostei: Cyprinidae) in Peninsular Malaysia. Zootaxa 4472 (2): 327-342, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4472.2.6|2 occurrences
